item.title: Testing with Ponytest
item.description: PonyTest is Pony’s unit testing framework. It is designed to be as simple as possible to use, both for the unit test writer and the user running the tests. Each unit test is a class, with a single test function. By default, all tests run concurrently. Each test run is provided with a helper object. This provides logging and assertion functions. By default log messages are only shown for tests that fail.
